an4.6:1.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.6:1.2: What four? A person may have:
an4.6:1.3: Little learning and not get the point of learning.
an4.6:1.4: Little learning but get the point of learning.
an4.6:1.5: Much learning but not get the point of learning.
an4.6:1.6: Much learning and get the point of learning.
an4.6:1.7: And how has a person learned little and not got the point of learning?
an4.6:1.8: It’s when a person has learned little of the
an4.6:1.9: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
an4.6:1.10: And with the little they’ve learned, they understand neither the meaning nor the text, nor do they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:1.11: That’s how a person has learned little and not got the point of learning.
an4.6:2.1: And how has a person learned little but has got the point of learning?
an4.6:2.2: It’s when a person has learned little of the
an4.6:2.3: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
an4.6:2.4: But with the little they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:2.5: That’s how a person has learned little but has got the point of learning.
an4.6:3.1: And how has a person learned much but hasn't got the point of learning?
an4.6:3.2: It’s when a person has learned much of the
an4.6:3.3: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
an4.6:3.4: But even though they’ve learned much, they understand neither the meaning nor the text, nor do they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:3.5: That’s how a person has learned much but hasn't got the point of learning.
an4.6:4.1: And how has a person learned much and has got the point of learning?
an4.6:4.2: It’s when a person has learned much of the
an4.6:4.3: statements, songs, discussions, verses, inspired exclamations, legends, stories of past lives, amazing stories, and classifications.
an4.6:4.4: And with the large amount they’ve learned, they understand the meaning and the text, and they practice in line with the teaching.
an4.6:4.5: That’s how a person has learned much and has got the point of learning.
an4.6:4.6: These are the four people found in the world.
an4.6:5.3: they’ll criticize you on both counts,
an4.6:5.4: for your ethics and your learning.
an4.6:6.2: and you are steady in ethics,
an4.6:8.2: and you are steady in ethics,
an4.6:8.3: they’ll praise you on both counts,
an4.6:8.4: for your ethics and your learning.
an4.6:9.1: A wise disciple of the Buddha
an4.6:9.2: who is learned and has memorized the teachings;
an4.6:9.3: like a pendant of river gold,
an4.6:9.4: who is worthy to criticize them?
an4.6:9.6: and by Brahmā, too, they’re praised.”
